pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistics Norway's Miscellaneous Tools // Functions used by other packages from Statistics Norway are gathered. General data manipulation functions, algorithms for statistical disclosure control (Langsrud, 2024) doi:10.1007/978-3-031-69651-0_6 and functions for hierarchical computations by sparse model matrices are included (Langsrud, 2023) doi:10.32614/RJ-2023-088.
